name: Flying Orange
description:
Flying Orange is a platform game in which you'll control this little orange to escape the dangers of space with the help of your jetpack. Collect fuel along the way, jump high to avoid falling into dangerous traps, activate levers that will open all kinds of traps and reach the exit door before your life is in danger. Good luck !

Controls
  • Left arrow key = move left
  • Right arrow key - move right
  • Z = jump
  • X = use jet

Contact : magnificstudios10@gmail.com
